title: Поздний срок
overview: Lera Smirnova was the embodiment of a successful woman. She came to Moscow as a novice journalist from the province, and became the owner of her own news agency. Once she dreamed of seeing the live journalism master Yuri Smirnov, and he became her husband. A happy marriage, an enviable career - Lera's life was an example for many ... Until one day she turned into a nightmare. Lera faced a choice - between the life of her husband and the life of her long-awaited child ... And this choice forever changed her life.
